scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.coverage: npm run clean:coverage; nyc --reporter=text npm run test
scripts.coverage:codecov: npm run coverage && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && codecov
scripts.coverage:html: npm run clean:coverage; nyc --reporter=html npm run test; open coverage/index.html
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run ci && npm run build
